replies.body:
Don't be stupid. He's been out for less then a day.

Don't pretend you've learned to play against him yet.
Well if Riot released a champ that was like current {{champion:83}}, then nobody would buy it. Riot exists to take your money, not balance the game as you have been lead to believe.
eh i don't like him, he's fun to mess around with but i could never play him seriously, he's e is too much fun
